Message.Title: Amazon P/E at 289
Message.Msg: Can you folks believe this? It's a short trap of biblical proportions! Tulips of the 21st century

Poor broke g@yly obsessed John Osborne and pals. It's too obvious you never invest (even in your own lost family) because your gurlies are up here day and night blathering about "all one poster" and believing your own stupid lies. Investors don't do that. In actuality, people will not listen to a broke mentally ill board troll who, with his other ID pals, blathers 247 for 12 long years, as your z50com ebay fails, your daughter seeks heroin for a father, and you couldn't even pay for your drug growing hovel at 5008 Hanover Circle Cypress, CA 90630. Investors do not respect dead beat bums and failed father/grandfathers huffing weed and melting about obsessions. Ebay is a pumped up wonder right now. Won't last. You won't last either. Why waste your old man days melting and obsessing on your lies?
Sold the place for $445,000 Enough to pay the bills for a long time ~ LOL

Can they believe a broke homeless pot head talking investments? Where did you plagiarize that from? The only thing regarding "tulips" about you is you and your Board Troll Gang Of Cowards are constantly sneering, smearing, puking and twisted in anger while you try to get your 'two lips' on Flyktning's noodle. I guess you'll say anything to keep neglecting your daughter and grandkid. Now melt all day to show us that's not the truth. Whoops, you all will do it again.
Pssssst Dribbles Daughter all grown up She lives over 100 miles from me now SHE'S ON HER OWN! Get Over It
People can look right on the web page and see "Short sell fixer upper" and know you didn't get any of that money. Nice lying Sparky. No cigar. And no home.
http://www.southerncaliforniahomes.com/orange/cypress/home/5008-Hanover-Circle,-Cypress,-CA-90630/P819639
Don't believe everything you read ~ LOL The bank won't take the short sale so we sold it conventional and made MONEY!

I don't believe anything I read from you, nor do I think anyone does, except your little gang of "{beautiful sphinter boys" who daily melt here. You always were a lying fountain of llies, melt and disinformnation. I do believe your daughter got clear away from your abuse and neglect though. First smart thing an Osborne's done in 3 generations. Everyone but you, and your similar pals, can see you're a life time loser, a sad intellictually inferior drop out, always angry at the educated, always angry at the world, and not able to face your personal 'proclicities' while you project that sickness on whoever you can target and an every day effort for 12 long years has only got you laughed at, outed, poorer, more mentally messed up, and tossed out of your dope house, but I guess as long as Sully and Sully's Licker laugh with you you'll pretend not to face that you are a loser, a worthless loser, and your lives were completely wasted. And the only thing you ever did that was almost something has moved far away from you. Melt on Sparky. It's all you have and all you'll ever ever have old man. One might say that was tragic were it to happen to a normal human. With you? Too bad. All well deserved.

Oh son! John's up here so early fixating on me? She thinks I'm you? Yawn! You've clearly given them waaaaaaay too many typos to fixate and obsess over. You're trying to push them over the edge aren't you? Carry on! Beach time weekend party for me. Drop in if you want.

You see Ewike, chocking chickens together under the rainbow flag like John's gang: not good. Not tolerable! Cutting chickens heads off, torturing, frying, fileting, and serving the once bloody over medicated and deeply hormoned pieces of them as food = nsuccessful g@y hating business.
That was hilarious SD! I see you're a fan of the typor torture too. Carry on. I'll be there about 1. It's going to be an endless melt festival up here all weekend anyways.
Post of the day! Thanks

Message.Title: romney deducted $77,000 for horse care in 2010
Message.Msg: for his HORSE??? At a time when 90% of American working families are struggling to receive healthcare, pay for life sustaining medications, food, transportation back and forth to work & skyrocketing utility cost, the romney's received a $77,000 tax credit for their horse?! Talk about WELFARE for the rich!? The American people should be outraged with the "rigged"(from the bottom up) wealth transfer that has occurred during the past 30 years. According to forbes, "If you’re making more than $50,000, you’re in the top 44% of Americans." which means 56% of Americans earn less than $50K which is $22K LESS than the romney's $77K tax deduction for their HORSE??!! C'mon people! GET REAL! This is total BS & EVERYONE knows it.
